name: BrainDamage
description:
LosingOurMinds Maiden Project- Brain Damage

Control a comatose patient slowly but surely trying to piece their fractured mind back together again. Battle the imagination constructs that are thrown at you from a brain that is on its last legs in order to rebuild what was shattered by an unfortunate accident.

Credits: 

Made by a ragtag team of students who seemed to think that a rhythm game with 6 levels was feasible in less than 6 weeks(and somehow might be able to pull it off)

Adrian Gayosso- The music guy(no seriously he makes great music)

Michelle McDougall - Artist #1 of 3(She made a crap ton of art, especially at night for some reason)

Leah Morris - Artist #1 of 3 (You read that right, Made up all our animations, hella art and even rigged up said animations)

Christina Heather Wright - Artist #1 of 3 (All our artists are #1, Background artist, scripter, and ... voice actor? )

Olaoluwa Ifeiji - Script writing person(The last guy in the group, completely lost his mind writing scripts)
